manifest_version.description: Version of the extension.json schema the extension.json file is in.

namemsg.description: i18n message key of the extension's name.

type.description: The extension's type, as an index to $wgExtensionCredits.

version.description: The version of this release of the extension.

url.description: URL to the homepage for the extension.

descriptionmsg.description: Message key for a i18n message describing the extension.

license-name.description: SPDX identifier for the license under which the extension is released.

requires.description: Indicates what versions of MediaWiki core are required. This syntax may be extended in the future, for example to check dependencies between other extensions.

MediaWiki.description: Version constraint string against MediaWiki core.

ResourceFileModulePaths.description: Default paths to use for all ResourceLoader file modules

localBasePath.description: Base path to prepend to all local paths, relative to current directory

remoteExtPath.description: Base path to prepend to all remote paths, relative to $wgExtensionAssetsPath

remoteSkinPath.description: Base path to prepend to all remote paths, relative to $wgStylePath

localBasePath.description: Base path to prepend to all local paths in $options. Defaults to $IP

remoteBasePath.description: Base path to prepend to all remote paths in $options. Defaults to $wgScriptPath

remoteExtPath.description: Equivalent of remoteBasePath, but relative to $wgExtensionAssetsPath

skipFunction.description: Path to a file containing a JavaScript "skip function", if desired.

scripts.description: Scripts to always include (array of file paths)

languageScripts.description: Scripts to include in specific language contexts (mapping of language code to file path(s))

skinScripts.description: Scripts to include in specific skin contexts (mapping of skin name to script(s)

debugScripts.description: Scripts to include in debug contexts

loaderScripts.description: Scripts to include in the startup module

dependencies.description: Modules which must be loaded before this module

skinStyles.description: Styles to include in specific skin contexts (mapping of skin name to style(s))

group.description: Group with which this module should be loaded

deprecated.description: Whether the module is deprecated and usage is discouraged. Either a boolean or an object with key message can be used to customise deprecation message.

position.description: Position on the page to load this module at

templates.description: Templates to be loaded for client-side usage

targets.description: ResourceLoader target the module can run on

noflip.description: Whether to skip CSSJanus LTR-to-RTL flipping for this module. Recommended for styles imported from libraries that already properly handle their RTL styles. Default is false, meaning CSSJanus will be applied on RTL-mode output.

group.description: Group with which this module should be loaded

position.description: Position on the page to load this module at

targets.description: ResourceLoader target the module can run on

scripts.description: A list of on-wiki pages containing JavaScript that should be loaded

styles.description: A list of on-wiki pages containing CSS that should be loaded

ResourceModuleSkinStyles.description: ResourceLoader modules for custom skin styles

ConfigRegistry.description: Registry of factory functions to create Config objects

ChangeCredentialsBlacklist.description: AuthenticationRequest classes which can only be used internally for credentials change

RemoveCredentialsBlacklist.description: AuthenticationRequest classes which can only be used internally for credentials removal

protection.description: Userright(s) required to edit in this namespace

conditional.description: Whether the namespace is conditional upon configuration and should not be registered (requires separate registration via a hook)

GroupPermissions.description: Default permissions to give to user groups

RevokePermissions.description: Default permissions to revoke from user groups

GrantPermissions.description: Map of permissions granted to authorized consumers to their bundles, called 'grants'

GrantPermissionGroups.description: Map of grants to their UI grouping

GroupsAddToSelf.description: Groups a user can add to themselves

GroupsRemoveFromSelf.description: Groups a user can remove from themselves

AddGroups.description: Groups a user can add to users

RemoveGroups.description: Groups a user can remove from users

AvailableRights.description: User rights added by the extension

ContentHandlers.description: Mapping of model ID to class name

RecentChangesFlags.description: Flags (letter symbols) shown on RecentChanges pages

MediaHandlers.description: Plugins for media file type handling. Each entry in the array maps a MIME type to a PHP class name.

ExtensionFunctions.description: Function to call after setup has finished

ExtensionMessagesFiles.description: File paths containing PHP internationalization data

MessagesDirs.description: Directory paths containing JSON internationalization data

SpecialPages.description: SpecialPages implemented in this extension (mapping of page name to class name)

Hooks.description: Hooks this extension uses (mapping of hook name to callback)

JobClasses.description: Job types this extension implements (mapping of job type to class name)

LogTypes.description: List of new log types this extension uses

ActionFilteredLogs.description: List of log types which can be filtered by log actions

callback.description: A function to be called right after MediaWiki processes this file

_prefix.description: Prefix to put in front of configuration settings when exporting them to $GLOBALS

ParserTestFiles.description: Parser test suite files to be run by parserTests.php when no specific filename is passed to it

ServiceWiringFiles.description: List of service wiring files to be loaded by the default instance of MediaWikiServices

load_composer_autoloader.description: Load the composer autoloader for this extension, if one is present
